SELECT concat(date_format(now(), "%y%m%d"), LPAD(ifnull(max(substr(user_num, 7)), "0") + 1, 4, 0))
FROM user WHERE substr(user_num, 1, 6) = date_format(now(), "%y%m%d")
insert into user (user_num, user_name, birth_date, address, phone_num, id, pwd, email, nickname) values (#{userNum}, #{userName}, #{birthDate}, #{address}, #{phoneNum}, #{userId}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{nickname})
